trans-unit.source: Isolates into a separate class methods that are used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control and can be overridden by developers who extend the control, but are rarely needed by page developers.
trans-unit.target: Isola em métodos de classe separados que são usados pelo controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> e podem ser substituídos por desenvolvedores que estendem o controle, mas raramente são necessários para os desenvolvedores de página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class is the largest class in the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> classe é a classe maior no conjunto de controle de Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: It is also among the most important Web Parts classes because it is used on every Web page that contains Web Parts controls, and it coordinates and manages all Web Parts controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: Também é entre as classes de Web Parts mais importantes porque ele é usado em todas as páginas da Web que contém os controles de Web Parts, e ele coordena e gerencia todos os controles de Web Parts em uma página.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class is used so frequently, and because it contains so many exposed methods, some methods needed mostly by control developers who are extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control are contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> classe é usada com tanta frequência e porque ela contém muitos métodos expostos, alguns métodos necessários em sua maioria, os desenvolvedores de controle que estiver estendendo o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> contidos no controle de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> classe.

trans-unit.source: This isolation of less-used methods into the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class simplifies the API of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, and the isolated methods do not appear on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> object in IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: Esse isolamento de métodos menos usados para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> classe simplifica a API do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> classe e os métodos a isoladas não aparecem no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> objeto no IntelliSense.

trans-unit.source: Developers who use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class are likely to have scenarios where they need to inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control and customize it extensively.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores que usam o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> classe é provável que a cenários em que eles precisam herdam o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controlar e personalizá-la amplamente.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are building a Web portal application or a packaged set of Web Parts controls with custom display modes, custom zones, custom verbs, custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, and other extensions of the base Web Parts user interface (UI), in many cases (not all) you will need to override and extend some of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> members.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você estiver criando um aplicativo de portal da Web ou um conjunto de pacote de controles de Web Parts com modos de exibição personalizados, personalizada zonas, verbos personalizados, personalizada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles e outras extensões de base Web Parts interface do usuário (UI), em muitos casos (não todos) será necessário substituir e estender alguns do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> membros.

trans-unit.source: And although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class is sealed so you cannot inherit from it, your custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class will likely need to call a number of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> methods in order to manage Web Parts controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: E embora o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> classe for fechada, portanto você não pode herdar dele, personalizados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> classe provavelmente precisará chamar várias o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> métodos para gerenciar controles de Web Parts em uma página.

trans-unit.source: Like the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class provides a server control that has no UI and is never visible on a page.
trans-unit.target: Como o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> classe, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> classe fornece um controle de servidor que não tem nenhuma interface do usuário e nunca é visível em uma página.

trans-unit.source: Unlike <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class is never declared in the markup of a page; it is strictly a worker object that performs background tasks.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> classe nunca é declarada na marcação de uma página; é estritamente um objeto de trabalho que executa tarefas em segundo plano.

trans-unit.source: The typical way of using it is demonstrated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, which references it by means of the protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Internals%2A> property, and uses the referenced object to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> methods.
trans-unit.target: A maneira comum de usá-lo é demonstrada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> classe, que faz referência a ele por meio do método <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Internals%2A> propriedade e usa o objeto referenciado para chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class contains only methods; there are no properties or events.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> classe contém métodos apenas; não existem propriedades ou eventos.

trans-unit.source: All the methods in the class involve managing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, or connections between controls.
trans-unit.target: Todos os métodos na classe envolvem o gerenciamento <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles ou conexões entre os controles.

trans-unit.source: To handle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> includes methods for adding them (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.AddWebPart%2A>), removing them <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.RemoveWebPart%2A>), handling events <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.CallOnDeleting%2A>), getting or setting details about their relationship to their zone (for example, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetZoneIndex%2A>), or setting basic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control properties (for example, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsClosed%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasSharedData%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Para tratar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> inclui métodos para adicioná-los (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.AddWebPart%2A>), removê-los <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.RemoveWebPart%2A>), manipulação de eventos <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.CallOnDeleting%2A>), obter ou definir os detalhes sobre sua relação para sua zona (por exemplo, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetZoneIndex%2A>), ou a configuração básica <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> propriedades de controle (por exemplo, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsClosed%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasSharedData%2A>).

trans-unit.source: To handle connections, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> includes methods for deleting them (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.DeleteConnection%2A>), setting which transformer object to use (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A>), setting whether a connection is shared and whether it is static (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29>), and setting a connection error message to use (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetConnectErrorMessage%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Para lidar com conexões, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> inclui métodos para excluí-los (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.DeleteConnection%2A>), definir qual objeto transformador usar (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A>), a definição se uma conexão é compartilhado e se ele for estático (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29>) e definir uma mensagem de erro de conexão para usar (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetConnectErrorMessage%2A>).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> being added to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's collection of controls.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> que está sendo adicionado à coleção de controles do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or server control to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> ou um controle de servidor à coleção de controles <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> em uma página da Web.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that has been selected for closing.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> que foi selecionado para fechamento.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnClosing(System.EventArgs)" /> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Chama o método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnClosing(System.EventArgs)" /> do controle especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that has entered or exited the connect display mode.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> que entrou ou saiu do modo de exibição de conexão.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnConnectModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Chama o método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnConnectModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> do controle especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that has been selected for deletion.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> que foi selecionado para exclusão.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnDeleting(System.EventArgs)" /> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Chama o método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnDeleting(System.EventArgs)" /> do controle especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that has entered or exited edit display mode.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> que entrou ou saiu do modo de exibição de edição.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnEditModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Chama o método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnEditModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> do controle especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> that has been selected for deletion.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> que foi selecionado para exclusão.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> especificado foi excluído.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the connection has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booliano que indica se a conexão foi excluída.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the object to create.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> do objeto a ser criado.

trans-unit.source: Creates an object based on the parameter passed to the method.
trans-unit.target: Cria um objeto com base no parâmetro passado para o método.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> of the same type as <paramref name="type" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> do mesmo tipo que <paramref name="type" />.

trans-unit.source: The method uses the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGenerator> class to create the type, an alternative that offers better performance than using the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método usa o <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGenerator> classe para criar o tipo, uma alternativa que oferece um desempenho melhor do que usando o <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> that has been selected for deletion.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> que foi selecionado para exclusão.

trans-unit.source: Sets a property to indicate that the specified connection object has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Define uma propriedade para indicar que o objeto de conexão especificado foi excluído.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.DeleteConnection%2A> method is one step in the process of terminating an existing connection between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server controls on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.DeleteConnection%2A> método é uma etapa no processo de encerrar uma conexão existente entre dois <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> ou outros controles de servidor em uma página da Web.

trans-unit.source: It sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.ConnectionDeleted%2A> property value to `true` to indicate that `connection` is deleted.
trans-unit.target: Ele define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.ConnectionDeleted%2A> valor da propriedade `true` para indicar que `connection` é excluído.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that resides in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> que reside em uma zona.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ID of a zone that contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or server control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a ID de uma zona que contém o controle de servidor ou <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the ID of the zone that contains <paramref name="webPart" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa a ID da zona que contém <paramref name="webPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> method returns the ID of the zone that contains the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> método retorna a ID da zona que contém o controle referenciado pelo `webPart` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> property of `webPart` references the actual zone object that contains `webPart`, not the ID of the zone.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> propriedade `webPart` faz referência ao objeto real de zona que contém `webPart`, não a ID da zona.

trans-unit.source: If `webPart` is currently closed, the value of its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> property is `null`, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> method will return the ID of the last zone that `webPart` was in prior to being closed.
trans-unit.target: Se `webPart` está fechado no momento, o valor de seu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> é de propriedade `null`e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> método retornará a ID do último zona que `webPart` estava antes que está sendo fechado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> that is used to connect controls.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> que é usado para conectar controles.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the previously saved state data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que contém os dados de estado salvos anteriormente.

trans-unit.source: Loads previously saved state data for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> object that participates in a connection between controls.
trans-unit.target: Carrega dados de estado salvos anteriormente para um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> que participa de uma conexão entre controles.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control to be removed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> ou outro controle de servidor a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's collection of controls.
trans-unit.target: Remove um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> ou outro controle de servidor da coleção de controle do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes `webPart` from the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's collection of Web Parts controls that it maintains for the page.
trans-unit.target: Remove `webPart` do atual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> coleção de controles de Web Parts que mantém para a página do controle.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> that is used to connect controls.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> que é usado para conectar controles.

trans-unit.source: Saves state data for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> object that participates in a connection between controls.
trans-unit.target: Salva os dados de estado para um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> que participa em uma conexão entre controles.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the saved state data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que contém os dados de estado salvos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SaveConfigurationState%2A> method saves configuration data that is created when a user configures a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> control on a Web page as part of a connection between controls.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SaveConfigurationState%2A> método salva dados de configuração que são criados quando um usuário configura um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> controle em uma página da Web como parte de uma conexão entre os controles.

trans-unit.source: This configuration data is then reloaded each time the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> control is rendered, by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.LoadConfigurationState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esses dados de configuração, em seguida, são recarregados toda vez que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> controle é processado, usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.LoadConfigurationState%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that participates in a connection with another control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> que participa de uma conexão com outro controle.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the text of the error message.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o texto da mensagem de erro.

trans-unit.source: Establishes an errors message, and causes the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome" /> object that is responsible for rendering a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control to render that message rather than the contents of the control.
trans-unit.target: Estabelece uma mensagem de erros e faz com que o objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome" /> que é responsável por renderizar um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> renderize essa mensagem em vez do conteúdo do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetConnectErrorMessage%2A> method allows you to associate an error message with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that participates in connections.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetConnectErrorMessage%2A> método permite que você associe uma mensagem de erro com um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controle que participa de conexões.

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs when another control is forming a connection with the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter, then after the connection process has failed, the error message is displayed in the user interface (UI), rather than the contents of `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: Se ocorrer um erro quando outro controle está formando uma conexão com o controle referenciado pelo `webPart` parâmetro, em seguida, após o processo de conexão falhou, a mensagem de erro é exibida na interface do usuário (IU), em vez do conteúdo de `webPart`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object associated with `webPart` renders the error message in its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderPartContents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> objeto associado ao `webPart` processa a mensagem de erro em seu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderPartContents%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control that can have shared personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> ou outro controle de servidor que pode ter dados de personalização compartilhados.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>webPart</c> has shared data.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booliano que indica se uma <c>webPart</c> tem dados compartilhados.

trans-unit.source: Sets a property on a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control indicating whether the control has shared personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Define uma propriedade em um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> ou outro controle de servidor que indica se o controle tem dados de personalização compartilhados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasSharedData%2A> method indicates whether `webPart` has shared personalization data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasSharedData%2A> método indica se `webPart` compartilhou os dados de personalização.

trans-unit.source: The value of the `hasSharedData` parameter that is passed into the method is assigned to the `webPart` control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasSharedData%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da `hasSharedData` parâmetro que é passado para o método é atribuído a `webPart` do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasSharedData%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control that can have user personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> ou outro controle de servidor que pode ter dados de personalização de usuário.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>webPart</c> has shared data.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booliano que indica se uma <c>webPart</c> tem dados compartilhados.

trans-unit.source: Sets a property on a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control indicating whether the control has user personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Define uma propriedade em um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> ou outro controle de servidor que indica se o controle tem dados de personalização de usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasUserData%2A> method indicates whether `webPart` has individual user personalization data, as opposed to shared data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasUserData%2A> método indica se `webPart` tem dados de personalização de usuário individual, em vez de dados compartilhada.

trans-unit.source: The method assigns the value of the `hasUserData` parameter to the `webPart` control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasUserData%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O método atribui o valor da `hasUserData` parâmetro para o `webPart` do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasUserData%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> for which this method sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> para o qual este método define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed" />.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> is closed on a page.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booliano que indica se um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> está fechado em uma página.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed" /> de um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsClosed%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed%2A> property of `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsClosed%2A> método define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed%2A> propriedade `webPart`.

trans-unit.source: This method does not actually close `webPart`; it only sets the property that indicates whether `webPart` is closed.
trans-unit.target: Este método não fecha realmente `webPart`; ela somente define a propriedade que indica se `webPart` está fechado.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control or the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" /> de um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> ou a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared" /> de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A> method calls a method in a base class to set a property that indicates whether a particular instance of a control is shared.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A> método chama um método em uma classe base para definir uma propriedade que indica se uma determinada instância de um controle é compartilhada.

trans-unit.source: In the Web Parts control set, a shared control means a control that is visible to all users of a page.
trans-unit.target: No conjunto de controle de Web Parts, um controle compartilhado significa um controle que é visível para todos os usuários de uma página.

trans-unit.source: This is in contrast to a per-user control, which is visible only to the specific user who added the control to the page.
trans-unit.target: Isso é diferente de um controle por usuário, que é visível somente para o usuário específico que adicionou o controle para a página.

trans-unit.source: For more on personalization and shared versus per-user controls, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
trans-unit.target: Para mais personalização na e compartilhado versus controles de usuário, consulte [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> for which this method sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> para o qual este método define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" />.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>webPart</c> is shared.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booliano que indica se uma <c>webPart</c> é compartilhada.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" /> de um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A> method does not actually cause the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter to be shared; it only sets the property that indicates whether `webPart` is currently shared.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A> método não provoca o controle referenciado pelo `webPart` parâmetro a ser compartilhada; apenas define a propriedade que indica se `webPart` é compartilhado no momento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> between two <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> entre dois controles <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>connection</c> is shared.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booliano que indica se uma <c>conexão</c> é compartilhada.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared" /> de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A> method does not actually cause the control referenced by the `connection` parameter to be shared; it only sets the property that indicates whether `connection` is currently shared.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A> método não provoca o controle referenciado pelo `connection` parâmetro a ser compartilhada; apenas define a propriedade que indica se `connection` é compartilhado no momento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> for which this method sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> para o qual este método define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone" />.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>webPart</c> is a standalone control.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booliano que indica se uma <c>webPart</c> é um controle autônomo.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone" /> de um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStandalone%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStandalone%2A> método define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true` on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, it means that the control is not contained within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: Quando essa propriedade é definida como `true` em uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controle, isso significa que o controle não está contido em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zona.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control or the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic" /> de um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> ou a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic" /> de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%2A> method calls a method in a base class to set a property that indicates whether a particular instance of a control is static.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%2A> método chama um método em uma classe base para definir uma propriedade que indica se uma determinada instância de um controle é estática.

trans-unit.source: In the Web Parts control set, a static control is a control that is declared in the markup of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: No conjunto de controle de Web Parts, um controle estático é um controle que é declarado na marcação de uma página da Web.

trans-unit.source: This is in contrast to a dynamic control, which is either added to a page programmatically, or added by a user from a catalog of controls.
trans-unit.target: Isso é diferente de um controle dinâmico, que pode ser adicionado a uma página programaticamente ou adicionado por um usuário de um catálogo de controles.

trans-unit.source: A static control is inherently a shared control, meaning that it is visible to all users of a page, and although users can close a static control, they can never delete (permanently remove) it.
trans-unit.target: Um controle estático é inerentemente um controle compartilhado, o que significa que é visível para todos os usuários de uma página e, embora os usuários podem fechar um controle estático, eles não podem excluir (remover permanentemente)-lo.

trans-unit.source: For more on personalization, static versus dynamic controls, and shared versus per-user controls, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre personalização, estática e controles dinâmicos e compartilhado versus controles de usuário, consulte [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).

trans-unit.source: The control for which the property value is being set.
trans-unit.target: O controle para o qual o valor da propriedade está sendo definido.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>webPart</c> is static.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booliano que indica se uma <c>webPart</c> é estática.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic" /> de um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method is used to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic%2A> property value of the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Boolean%29> método é usado para definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic%2A> do controle referenciado pelo valor da propriedade de `webPart` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: If `webPart` is declared within a zone in the markup of a Web page, this method sets the property value to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se `webPart` declarada dentro de uma zona na marcação de uma página da Web, esse método define o valor da propriedade para `true`.

trans-unit.source: If `webPart` is added to a page programmatically, or by a user through the Web Parts user interface (UI), then this method sets the property value to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se `webPart` é adicionada a uma página programaticamente ou por um usuário por meio da interface de usuário de Web Parts (IU), em seguida, este método define o valor da propriedade `false`.

trans-unit.source: The connection for which the property value is being set.
trans-unit.target: A conexão para a qual o valor da propriedade está sendo definido.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>connection</c> is static.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booliano que indica se uma <c>conexão</c> é estática.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Define a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic" /> de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method is used to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A> property value of the connection referenced by the `connection` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> método é usado para definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A> da conexão referenciada pelo valor da propriedade de `connection` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: If `connection` is declared in the markup of a Web page, this method sets the property value to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se `connection` é declarado na marcação de uma página da Web, esse método define o valor da propriedade para `true`.

trans-unit.source: If `connection` is added to a page programmatically, or by a user through the Web Parts user interface (UI), then this method sets the property value to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se `connection` é adicionada a uma página programaticamente ou por um usuário por meio da interface de usuário de Web Parts (IU), em seguida, este método define o valor da propriedade `false`.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> that creates a connection between server controls.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> que cria uma conexão entre os controles de servidor.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> to be used with <c>connection</c>.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> a ser usado com a <c>conexão</c>.

trans-unit.source: Assigns a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> object to be used in a connection between two server controls.
trans-unit.target: Atribui um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> a ser usado em uma conexão entre dois controles de servidor.

trans-unit.source: When a connection between two server controls requires a transformer so that the consumer control can interpret data from the provider control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A> method is called to supply a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma conexão entre dois controles de servidor requer um transformador para que o controle de consumidor pode interpretar os dados do controle de provedor, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A> método é chamado para fornecer um determinado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> o objeto para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If the connection already has a transformer assigned to it, the object referenced by the `transformer` parameter overrides the existing one; otherwise, the object referenced in the `transformer` parameter is used.
trans-unit.target: Se a conexão já tem um transformador atribuído a ele, o objeto referenciado pelo `transformer` parâmetro substitui o já existente; caso contrário, o objeto referenciado no `transformer` parâmetro é usado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A> method whenever you call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> method to establish a connection that requires a transformer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controlar usa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A> método sempre que você chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> método para estabelecer uma conexão que exige um transformador.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> whose <c>zoneID</c> property value is being set.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> cujo valor da propriedade <c>zoneID</c> está sendo definido.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the zone that <c>webPart</c> belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a ID da zona à qual <c>webPart</c> pertence.

trans-unit.source: Sets a property that enables a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or server control to keep the ID of the containing zone.
trans-unit.target: Define uma propriedade que habilita um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> ou controle de servidor para manter a ID da zona de contenção.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is being added to a zone.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controlar quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controle está sendo adicionado a uma zona.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control tracks the ID for the zone it belongs to, and this method sets the property that keeps the ID value.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controle controla a ID para a zona que pertence a, e esse método define a propriedade que mantém o valor de ID.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control for which the method sets a zone index.
trans-unit.target: Um controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> para o qual o método define um índice de zona.

trans-unit.source: The index of <c>webPart</c> within its zone relative to other controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: O índice da <c>webPart</c> dentro da zona em relação a outros controles na zona.

trans-unit.source: Sets the index of the specified control within its zone relative to the other <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls within the zone.
trans-unit.target: Define o índice do controle especificado dentro da zona em relação a outros controles <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> dentro da zona.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetZoneIndex%2A> method determines the ordinal position that `webPart` occupies in its zone, relative to other server controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetZoneIndex%2A> método determina o ordinal de posição que `webPart` ocupa na sua região, em relação a outros controles de servidor na zona.
